item.title: VSCode + HUGO
item.description: Dotfiles Bspwm Simple & Elegant. dotfiles? # Dotfiles are configuration files in the Linux operating system used to set user settings and preferences for various tools and applications such as shells, text editors, version control, and more, allowing users to easily maintain consistency and personalization across multiple systems and share their settings with the community. Summary Dotfiles is a Configuration that includes elegant themes for the terminal, some smart shortcuts that enrich the computing experience, and others.
